text: 20:17 has been the best year of my life
it's the year that I first picked up a
video camera to make videos on Facebook
and 45 millions years later so many new
doors have opened up for me in 2017 I
lived in both Hanoi and Manila with
Deanna I visited 43 countries 79 cities
and six continents by means of 101
airplanes 225 ubers 17 long buses 13
train rides two cruises broke one
Guinness world record slept in sixty-six
hotels three airports and made hundreds
of new friends all of that craziness on
a map looks something like this here my
top ten memories of 2017 and no
particular order one expedition to
Antarctica coming fresh off my trip I
still can't believe it was real a
blanket of white natural beauty unlike
I've ever dreamed of seeing penguins
going about their daily business I just
can't explain how magical it was to
spending four days in North Korea my
trip to North Korea and running in the
Pyongyang marathon was the most surreal
travel experience of my life almost
finished with the race tens of thousands
people behind me it was really cool to
meet and interact with North Koreans and
to witness the most isolated culture
with my own two eyes
three scuba diving in Belize ever since
I got scuba certified it was a dream to
dive in the world's second longest coral
reef I saw more activity in the belief
water than a never seen before truly
magnificent experience for exploring
Petra in Jordan all right got my hat on
was like a bad one now one of the 70
wonders of the world Petra is an ancient
city that's hath natural and hath carved
into giant rocks in the South Jordanian
desert you have to see it to believe it
five visiting Paris for the first time
Bonjour my first visit to Paris did not
disappoint
I surprised Deana for her birthday with
professional photos under the Eiffel
Tower
Paris was just as romantic European and
classy as I imagined six Ireland golf
trip was dead I took my dad on a
surprise seven-day golf trip to Ireland
and Scotland
playing these traditional courses was
much more challenging than what we used
to back home in Arizona but it was a
great father-son trip and one that I'll
never forget
seven cigars and rum in Cuba welcome to
LA welcome to LA I finally went to Cuba
with my buddy Evan in March and we had a
blast lots of rum cigars salsa dancing
baseball and I was most surprised by how
friendly the locals were eight wandering
the streets in samarkand uzbekistan we
are now in Samarkand
standing in the main square one of the
oldest cities in the world and a crucial
place along the ancient Silk Road
Samarkand sights and historical vibe
were very impressive
I love the blue tiled mosques and
mausoleums 9 Yosemite National Park in
California DNA and I took a week-long
road trip through California and we
spent a few days in beautiful Yosemite
National Park giant waterfalls
whitewater rafting steep cliffs lakes
and hazy morning views through the
streets a fantasy world ten teaching and
share Gallup Philippines I finally
visited the island that was highest on
my list in the Philippines
thank you for yeah yeah it's called
shear ago and it has beaches that look
like this and this and this everything
is Yoga is relaxing peaceful and
charming if you come to the Philippines
it'd be a crime not to go to Jericho and
finally maybe my best memory to close
out 2017 is a trip I'm currently on with
my family in Vietnam and the Philippines
we are having an amazing time huge
thanks to all my family friends and the
many new faces I met in 2017 who made
this year so special for me bigger and
better things to come in 2018 starting
with Africa I'm drew pinsky and if you
like my videos please click Subscribe
and join me as I plan to visit every
country in the world
